markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Bone Skipper Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=989)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A large swarm of bone skippers can reduce a human skeleton into dry, brittle fragments in a matter of hours.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Bone Skipper Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=989)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), bonesense (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Bonesense** A bone skipper swarm identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 9, slashing 9

**Weaknesses**
area damage 9, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 9

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 3d6 piercing damage (DC 24 basic Reflex save) plus exposure to marrow rot.

**Marrow Rot**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal system; **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 2** enfeebled 2 (1 day); **Stage 3** enfeebled 2 and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 day)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-207" />
name: Bone Skipper Swarm
